header.div: What will I learn in this unit?

div.h1: The Speaking Test Phase 2: Dealing with the topic
div.p: You will read advice for candidates in Phase 2 of the speaking test, including a review of how to behave in the speaking test.

You will watch a candidate dealing with the Phase 2 topic and the questions that followed, and will think about what advice you would give the candidate. You will then watch two more candidates deal with the same topic.
You will think about the follow-up question and giving reasons for your answer.
Finally, you will study the link between Phase 2 and Phase 3 of the speaking test. You will watch three candidates talking about the news.
